timeline.content:
Hey Minseung, 

Thanks for contacting amber for your accommodation search in London! I am Prachi and I'll be helping you book your ideal student home. 

Happy to assist you with the process ahead. Thankyou : )

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello? Yeah, hi, I'm. Good afternoon. I am Prachi from Amber Students.
Speaker B: Yeah, hello.
Speaker C: Yeah, I am really sorry. I have. I really don't have any idea why.
Speaker D: The property reception person said that there is no email that they have received. That's why I shared a screenshot with you. You could have, like, shown them that, but not a problem. So your viewing was okay, right? You had a proper view for the property?
Speaker E: I mean.
Speaker B: Yeah, I. I saw the screenshot, so I. I went there and no, there.
Speaker F: Was no other reception.
Speaker B: So one of the.
Speaker F: One of the people living there let me and they showed me around.
Speaker B: So I. I did see the property and I. And if I'm gonna contract, I.
Speaker G: They said I'll. I have to call the people there, so I'll do that.
Speaker D: Sorry.
Speaker C: Like, you have done the viewing, right?
Speaker B: Yeah, I've done the viewing, but I'm still looking at different accommodations.
Speaker G: So I'm not sure if I'm gonna book there or not.
Speaker A: Not a problem.
Speaker C: So when do you think that you.
Speaker D: Will be able to decide?
Speaker A: Like, do you want to have a.
Speaker D: Call day after tomorrow? Like, you can take one or two days of a time period and we can connect day after tomorrow for an update. Sorry, I'm saying you can take some time to look for the other options too. So do you want to have a call for an update day after tomorrow?
Speaker B: Yeah, I'll probably book wherever it is tomorrow. But they said I'll probably book with.
Speaker G: The person that was at. Like, there was a person that worked there and she said to call her if I want to book. So I'll probably end up calling her.
Speaker C: Like, calling her to book the accommodation.
Speaker B: Yes, because she. She worked there. She.
Speaker F: She was the one that was.
Speaker B: That was supposed to be at the reception.
Speaker A: I totally understand your point, but as.
Speaker D: We like, like help you, like, have a viewing in the accommodation, so you can start the process with us if you want to book any room in that accommodation.
Speaker E: I'll. I'll.
Speaker B: I'll have a thought. I'll have a thought and I'll let you know.
Speaker E: Sure.
Speaker A: I'll just have a call with you tomorrow.
Speaker D: You can let me know. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay. Okay.

Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, hi, Min Singh. Good afternoon.
Speaker B: Good afternoon.
Speaker A: Yeah, I'm Prachi from Amber, Student for accommodation assistance.
Speaker B: Yes. Sorry, who is this?
Speaker A: I'm the one who arranged your viewing for the accommodation.
Speaker B: Oh, for which accommodation?
Speaker A: For Lewis House.
Speaker B: Oh, Louise Hall. Yeah, so I. I'm signing a contract today for a different house, so.
Speaker A: Yeah. Okay. So is it a private accommodation that you are booking or a student accommodation?
Speaker B: Yeah, I'm. I'm signing with Canvas Walton.
Speaker A: Stow, so.
Speaker B: And I'm. I'm already. That's already arranged.
Speaker A: So you're booking directly with the accommodation?
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah.
Speaker A: Okay, not a problem. Thank you for the information. If, in case you required any assistance. So you can let us know if you want. You want to book that accommodation with us so I can also help you out.
Speaker B: Yeah, thank you, but I'm booking. I'll be booking with London next, so thank you, but.
Speaker A: Yeah, not a problem. Thank you, thank you.
